tldr: Affected versions of this package are affected by a potential Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability that may arise from the use of predictable randomness in the context of repeated failures when creating temporary files. Such a vulnerability could facilitate an attackerâ€™s ability to exploit the system by leveraging the inadequacies of the randomness employed, ultimately leading to disruptions in service availability.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `tempfile` library to the patch version.
